Resource-oriented framework for JSON:API-compliant interfaces

Related repos

  • GraphQL API server for databases and custom services
  • Library for creating graph data structures
  • Open-source JSON editor, visualizes JSON as interactive graphs, converts formats, validates, generates schema, executes queries
  • visual JSON viewer and editor with graph, table, and comparison features
  • cross-platform API testing client for REST and GraphQL
  • Builds knowledge graphs for agents
  • Modularizes and decouples graph-based retrieval-augmented generation methods
  • cross-platform API client for testing, visualizing, and integrating APIs
  • graph-based retrieval for interpretable and efficient RAG workflows
  • Graph RAG with node heterogeneity
